mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO XJL_T_PAYMENT_REQUEST (PQ_ID,INVEST_PAYMENT_TYPE,INVESTOR,RECEIVER,APP_USER,APP_DT,FINANCE_TYPE,PAY_DT,PAY_AMOUNT,PAY_CURRENCY,RMB_INVE_AMOUNT,PAYEE_NAME,DUE_BANK,RECEIVABLE_ACCOUNT,PAYMENT_ACCOUNT,DESC_FILE,REMARK,STATUS,PROCESS_INST_ID,CREATE_BY,CREATE_DT,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_DT,PROJECT_OR_FUND_ID,PROJECT_OR_FUND_NAME,INVESTOR_ID,RECEIVER_ID,APP_USER_ID,LEDGER_OBJECT,TOTAL_INVE_AMOUNT,TOTAL_INVE_CURRENCY,TOTAL_INVE_AMOUNT_RMB,SUM_INVE_AMOUNT,SUM_INVE_CURRENCY,UNPAID_AMOUNT,UNPAID_CURRENCY,TOTAL_PERIOD,CURRENT_PERIOD,DEPT_ID,DEPT_NAME,GROUP_ID,GROUP_NAME,MONEY_DESC,MONEY_DESC_ATT,ACTUAL_PAY_DATE,ATTA_FILE,CONTRACT_FILE_ID)
( select #{item.pqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.investPaymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.investor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.appUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.appDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.financeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.payDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.payAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.payCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rmbInveAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.payeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dueBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receivableAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paymentAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.descFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.processInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.projectOrFundId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.projectOrFundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.investorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.appUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ledgerObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalInveAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.totalInveCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalInveAmountRmb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sumInveAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sumInveCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unpaidAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.unpaidCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalPeriod,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.currentPeriod,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.moneyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.moneyDescAtt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.actualPayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.attaFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contractFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual)
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM XJL_T_PAYMENT_REQUEST WHERE PQ_ID IN
#{item}
mapper.update:
UPDATE XJL_T_PAYMENT_REQUEST
PQ_ID = #{pqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVEST_PAYMENT_TYPE = #{investPaymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVESTOR = #{investor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVER = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_USER = #{appUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_DT = #{appDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FINANCE_TYPE = #{financeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_DT = #{payDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_AMOUNT = #{payAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PAY_CURRENCY = #{payCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RMB_INVE_AMOUNT = #{rmbInveAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PAYEE_NAME = #{payeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUE_BANK = #{dueBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVABLE_ACCOUNT = #{receivableAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_ACCOUNT = #{paymentAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC_FILE = #{descFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_INST_ID = #{processInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DT = #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DT = #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROJECT_OR_FUND_ID = #{projectOrFundId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_OR_FUND_NAME = #{projectOrFundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVESTOR_ID = #{investorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_USER_ID = #{appUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEDGER_OBJECT = #{ledgerObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_INVE_AMOUNT = #{totalInveAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
TOTAL_INVE_CURRENCY = #{totalInveCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_INVE_AMOUNT_RMB = #{totalInveAmountRmb,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SUM_INVE_AMOUNT = #{sumInveAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SUM_INVE_CURRENCY = #{sumInveCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNPAID_AMOUNT = #{unpaidAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
UNPAID_CURRENCY = #{unpaidCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_PERIOD = #{totalPeriod,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
CURRENT_PERIOD = #{currentPeriod,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_NAME = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONEY_DESC = #{moneyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONEY_DESC_ATT = #{moneyDescAtt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTUAL_PAY_DATE = #{actualPayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ATTA_FILE = #{attaFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_FILE_ID = #{contractFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE PQ_ID = #{pqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql:
select t1.*, U.NAME AS APP_USER_NAME from XJL_T_PAYMENT_REQUEST t1 LEFT JOIN BASE.APP_USER U ON U.ID = T1.APP_USER
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(1) as cnt FROM BASE.APP_USERROLE WHERE ROLEID in (select ROLEID from base.APP_ROLEPERMISSION t where t.PERMISSIONID=10107) AND APPID = 10001 and USERID=TO_CHAR(#{paramMap.loginUser.userId}) ) tt on 1=1
T1.STATUS <> '9' AND t1.invest_payment_type = '4'
AND (t1.group_id=#{paramMap.orgIdOrDeptId} or t1.dept_id=#{paramMap.orgIdOrDeptId})
AND (case when tt.cnt!=0 then t1.create_by else TO_CHAR(#{paramMap.loginUser.userId}) end)=TO_CHAR(#{paramMap.loginUser.userId})
order by t1.create_dt desc
